recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add red pepper flakes (if using) and cook for another 10 seconds.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water. Add pasta to the pan with garlic and oil. Toss to coat.
Add a splash of pasta water at a time, tossing constantly, until a creamy sauce forms. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken breast into thin strips. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, honey, and cornstarch. Add chicken and marinate for 15 minutes.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown and cooked through.
Add broccoli and red bell pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, or until tender-crisp.
Serve chicken and vegetables over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, and oregano. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Puree soup with an immersion blender or in batches in a regular blender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
For grilled cheese, prepare sandwiches with bread and cheese slices. Butter outside of bread slices. Cook in a pan over medium heat until golden brown and cheese is melted.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
instructions: In a bowl, mix canned tuna with mayonnaise, chopped celery, red onion, and dill pickle relish (if using).
Spread tuna salad on slices of bread. Add lettuce and tomato slices (optional).
Enjoy your tuna salad sandwich!

recipes.name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour until smooth. Cook for 1 minute.
Slowly whisk in milk, bringing to a simmer. Cook until thickened, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in cheddar cheese until melted. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Combine cooked macaroni with cheese sauce and toss to coat. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken breasts into thin strips. Slice bell peppers and onion.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until golden brown and cooked through.
Add bell peppers and onion to the pan and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Season with fajita seasoning to taste.
Warm tortillas according to package directions.
Serve chicken fajita mixture with tortillas, shredded cheese, guacamole, and sour cream (optional).

recipes.name: Cheesy Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Warm corn tortillas according to package directions to make them pliable.
Spread a thin layer of enchilada sauce on the bottom of the baking dish.
In a bowl, combine shredded chicken, diced tomatoes, green chiles (if using), and half of the cheddar cheese and Monterey Jack cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture and roll up. Place seam side down in the prepared baking dish.
Pour remaining enchilada sauce over the top of the rolled tortillas. Sprinkle with remaining cheddar cheese and Monterey Jack cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh fruit in a parfait glass or bowl. Repeat layers as desired.
Drizzle with honey (optional) and sprinkle with chopped nuts (optional) for extra flavor and crunch.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-fry
instructions: Marinate sliced flank steak in soy sauce, brown sugar, and cornstarch for at least 30 minutes (or longer for more flavorful meat).
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Stir-fry broccoli florets for 2-3 minutes, until tender-crisp. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add more oil to the pan if needed. Increase heat to high and stir-fry the marinated beef in batches until cooked through.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, water, and cornstarch to create a slurry. Add the sauce to the pan with the cooked beef and bring to a simmer. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly.
Return the broccoli florets to the pan and toss to combine with the sauce and beef.
Serve beef and broccoli stir-fry over cooked white rice.

recipes.name: Veggie Burgers
instructions: Mash black beans in a bowl. Add cooked brown rice, bread crumbs, chopped onion, egg, cumin, and chili powder. Mix well to combine.
Form the mixture into patties. Heat a pan with oil over medium heat.
Cook veggie burgers for a few minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Serve on burger buns with your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter. Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Heat a lightly greased griddle or pan over medium heat. Pour batter onto the griddle to form pancakes.
Cook for a few minutes per side, until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges start to set. Flip and cook for another minute or two, until golden brown.
